FromBankAccount.description: The source bank account of the transfer.

ToBankAccount.description: The destination bank account of the transfer.

Amount.description: The amount of the bank transfer.

Date.description: The date of the bank transfer.

DateString.description: The string representation of the date of the bank transfer.

BankTransferID.description: Unique identifier for the bank transfer.

CurrencyRate.description: The currency exchange rate for the bank transfer.

FromBankTransactionID.description: The ID of the bank transaction from the source account.

ToBankTransactionID.description: The ID of the bank transaction to the destination account.

HasAttachments.description: Flag indicating if the bank transfer has any attachments.

CreatedDateUTC.description: The timestamp when the bank transfer was created in UTC timezone.

CreatedDateUTCString.description: The string representation of the timestamp when the bank transfer was created in UTC timezone.
